citation_title: Business Failures by Branch of Business in the United States, 1895 to 1935: A Statistical History
topics:
Other

Law and Economics

Industrial Organization

Industry Studies

History

Macroeconomic History

Financial History

Other History
abstract: Dun’s Review began publishing monthly data on bankruptcies by branch of business during the 1890s. Those series evolved through many iterations. This essay reconstructs the series from 1895 to 1935 and discusses how it can be used for economic analysis.
acknowledgement: The authors received financial support from NSF Grants SES- 2214557 and SES-2214565 while completing this research. The views expressed herein are those of the authors and do not necessarily reflect the views of the National Bureau of Economic Research.
